page.title: 08ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: SOCIAL Included here are whist and domino drives, beetle drives, bingo, discos, autumn or spring fairs, coffee mornings, garden parties and wine and cheese evenings. These are usually run by the various parish organizations, either for charity or their own funds and are held either in the Village Hall or Newton School.Most are occasional; thewhist and domino drives are weekly but the garden parties are annual events. THE ARTS There are practically no entertainments of this kind; the Duke's Playhouse from Lancaster have performed plays in Newton School from time to time, but they have been poorly attended. INSTRUCTIONAL This overlaps adult education to a point;the Flower Arranging classes and the Local History talks come into this.
